item.title: ChromeOS Shortcomings
item.description: I've been using ChromeOS as my main development machine for a while now. At first I logged in under my personal gmail and used Crouton for development, but after Crostini I decided to separate out my work and personal items. Here are a few things that still bother me and why I might go back to a full linux environment: Multiple Users - sign out There are two major problems with multiple users on Chrome.
